title: Cripple and One-legged Man: Diebitz and Stiebitz (Lahmer und Einbein: Diebitz und Stiebitz) (in-text plate, page 22) from Der Findling (The Foundling)
medium: One from an illustrated book with twenty line block reproductions after woodcuts, one line block reproduction after drawing on title page, and one line block reproduction after drawing (duplicate of title page) on front cover
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 4 x 4 1/2" (10.2 x 11.5 cm); page: 12 3/16 x 9 1/4" (31 x 23.5 cm)
